description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. An multiplayer platformer that takes place underground. Dig down for gold, but you'll have to contend with monsters and other players. Gather treasure, lie in wait for an ambush, and lay devious traps. Procedurally-generated levels ensure that no two games are exactly the same. Struggle for subterranean supremacy!
description.short: An multiplayer platformer that takes place underground. Dig down for gold, but you'll have to contend with monsters and other players.
